reviewText: Simply said, Denton Rose is hilariously funny. This guy is so versatile; he's a natural comic. If you want a good laugh, if you need a good laugh... get the DVD.
How can you look at the cover and not chuckle?  This guy is NUTS!  Want to brighten your day?  Watch Denton Rose's Shorts, this guy CRACKS ME UP!

Folks, there's just no other way to put it: Denton Rose is pure FUN!

These days, with all that's going on around the world to bring us down, it's refreshing to find someone whose major goal in life is to make others laugh!

Denton Rose accomplishes this---you may shake your head in amazement at his antics, but I promise you: you WILL laugh, a lot!

Do yourself a favor and buy this video---better yet, buy 12 copies and spread them around amongst your friends and family members---Believe me, they will thank you for it!
